# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/linux-x64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/rich/_log_render.py
@source-hash: d41c88d0f035669c
@generated: 2026-02-09T18:01:41Z

## LogRender - Structured Log Message Formatter for Rich Console

**Primary Purpose**: Formats log messages into structured table layout with optional time, level, path, and message columns for Rich console output.

### Key Components

**LogRender Class (L14-86)**
- Core log message formatter that produces Rich Table objects
- Configurable display options for time, level, path components
- Implements time deduplication to reduce visual clutter

**Constructor (L15-30)**
- `show_time`: Controls timestamp column visibility
- `show_level`: Controls log level column visibility  
- `show_path`: Controls file path column visibility
- `time_format`: String format or callable for time display
- `omit_repeated_times`: Deduplicates consecutive identical timestamps
- `level_width`: Fixed width for level column (default 8)
- `_last_time`: Tracks previous timestamp for deduplication

**__call__ Method (L32-86)**
- Main formatting logic - converts log data into Table
- Creates grid-style table with conditional columns based on configuration
- Handles time formatting via string templates or callable functions
- Constructs file path display with optional hyperlink support
- Returns populated Table ready for console rendering

### Dependencies
- `rich.text.Text`: Text styling and formatting
- `rich.table.Table`: Grid layout structure  
- `rich.containers.Renderables`: Message content wrapper
- `datetime`: Timestamp handling

### Key Patterns
- **Conditional Column Building**: Dynamically adds table columns based on show_* flags
- **Time Deduplication**: Replaces repeated timestamps with whitespace of same length
- **Hyperlink Support**: Creates file:// links for path/line number navigation
- **Lazy Imports**: Defers Table/Renderables imports until needed in __call__

### Critical Behaviors
- Always includes message column with overflow="fold" and ratio=1 for flexible width
- Time display uses console.get_datetime() as fallback when log_time not provided
- Path column only added when both show_path=True AND path parameter provided
- File links include line numbers when available (#line_no anchor)
